project_name: Music Genre Exploration and Quiz Bot

theme_strategy.rationale: A deep, immersive ocean aesthetic that combines the mystery of the deep sea with futuristic tech elements. Uses deep teal-blacks as the void and bio-luminescent cyans/purples for interaction.
visual_enhancers: Glassmorphism with noise texture (Deep Sea Glass)

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major stats. Use tracking-tight for sizes over 3xl.

mono.usage: Leaderboard stats, timers, music metadata, track times.

general.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for sections. 2x standard tailwind spacing.

dashboard.card_style: bg-glass-teal backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 hover:border-biolum-cyan/50 transition-all duration-300

quiz_interface.bot_bubble: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm p-6 text-slate-200 border border-white/5 self-start max-w-[80%]
quiz_interface.user_bubble: bg-biolum-cyan text-deep-ocean font-bold rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm p-4 self-end max-w-[80%] shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(34,211,238,0.3)]
quiz_interface.input_area: Fixed bottom, glassmorphism, floating above content.

shadcn_ui_modifications.Card: Remove bg-card, use bg-glass-teal/50 backdrop-blur-md border-border/30
shadcn_ui_modifications.Input: bg-black/20 border-white/10 focus:border-biolum-cyan focus:ring-1 focus:ring-biolum-cyan placeholder:text-slate-600

custom_components.name: WaveVisualizer
custom_components.description: Animated audio visualizer bars using framer-motion

images.description: Abstract blue wave light on black - Main Hero Background
images.usage: Landing page hero section background with overlay

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Delete App.css content. Update tailwind.config.js with the colors provided.
2. THEME: Enforce 'dark' class on the html element by default.
3. QUIZ: Implement the Chat Interface strictly as defined in layout_strategy. Do not use standard forms.
4. AUDIO: Create a global 'PlayerContext' to handle Spotify preview URLs so playback persists across navigation.
5. DASHBOARD: Use the Bento Grid layout. Do not just stack cards vertically.
6. TESTING: Add data-testid to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, quiz options).
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not leave empty placeholders.
8. SHADCN: When installing shadcn components, ensure you override the default background colors in your custom CSS or component usage to match the 'Abyssal Tech' theme.
9. FORBIDDEN: Do not use the color #1B93A4. Do not use generic 'Loading...' textâ€”use music-themed loaders (e.g., 'Tuning instruments...', 'Digging through crates...').
